item.title: The case of slow Visual Studio startup
item.description: In this post I would use Perfview /ETW to diagnose the delayed start-up of visual studio. To analyze the problem start-up VS within Perfview as a run command [gist https://gist.github.com/naveensrinivasan/5eb6406d6d38f2143acb] This would launch visual studio and collect etw traces. I have also enabled CodeMarkers , which is ETW traces for Visual Studio in case if you want to trace any extensions performance. After it completes I choose the CPU Stacks and filtered with devenv.
